attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The website mentioned above has very abusive and discriminative words and images and videos towards Islam and Muslims. This is highly unaccpetable for it to be allowed to be created, in a multi-faith country. We should al respect each other religion even if you dont agree with it. we all have the right to practise our religion, without a mockery being made.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
